mapper.select: SELECT t_device_ability.abilityName,t_device_ability.abilityType, t_device_ability.minVal, t_device_ability.minVal,t_device_type_abilitys.* FROM t_device_type_abilitys, t_device_type, t_device_ability WHERE t_device_type.id = t_device_type_abilitys.typeId AND t_device_ability.id = t_device_type_abilitys.abilityId AND t_device_type.id = #{typeId} and t_device_ability.status != 2

SELECT t_device_ability.abilityName,t_device_ability.abilityType, t_device_ability.minVal, t_device_ability.minVal,t_device_type_abilitys.* FROM t_device_type_abilitys, t_device_type, t_device_ability WHERE t_device_type.id = t_device_type_abilitys.typeId AND t_device_ability.id = t_device_type_abilitys.abilityId AND t_device_type.id = #{typeId} AND t_device_ability.abilityType = #{abilityType}
SELECT a.* FROM t_device_ability a, t_device_model_ability m WHERE m.abilityId = a.id AND m.status = 1 AND a.status = 1 AND m.modelId = #{modelId}
select t1.* from t_device_ability t1 LEFT join t_device_type_abilitys t2 on t1.id = t2.abilityId where t2.typeId = #{typeId}
select * from where dirValue like CONCAT('%',CONCAT(#{typeName},'%')) AND status = 1
select tda.abilityCode from t_device_ability tda,t_device td,t_device_model_ability tdm where 1=1 AND td.id = #{deviceId} AND td.modelId = tdm.modelId AND tdm.abilityId = tda.id AND tda.status = 1
